parameters.query:
SELECT * 
FROM conversations 
WHERE user_id = '{{ $json.body.userID }}' 
 AND message IS NOT NULL
 AND ai_reply IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY created_at DESC 
LIMIT 1 OFFSET 1

-- Fixed Insert Recent Interactions Query
INSERT INTO recent_interactions (
  user_id, 
  session_id, 
  interaction_type, 
  content, 
  category,
  pattern_detected,
  metadata, 
  confidence_level,
  emotional_signals
)
VALUES (
  '{{ $node["Async Entry1"].json.body.userID }}',
  {{ $json.session_id ? "'" + $json.session_id.replace(/'/g, "''") + "'" : 'NULL' }},
  {{ $json.interaction_type ? "'" + $json.interaction_type.replace(/'/g, "''") + "'" : "'text-chat'" }},
  {{ $json.content ? "'" + $json.content.replace(/'/g, "''") + "'" : 'NULL' }},
  {{ $json.category ? "'" + $json.category.replace(/'/g, "''") + "'" : "'general'" }},
  {{ $json.pattern_detected ? "'" + $json.pattern_detected.replace(/'/g, "''") + "'" : 'NULL' }},
  {{ $json.metadata ? "'" + JSON.stringify($json.metadata).replace(/'/g, "''") + "'::jsonb" : 'NULL' }},
  {{ $json.confidence_level || 0.5 }},
  {{ $json.emotional_signals ? "'" + JSON.stringify($json.emotional_signals).replace(/'/g, "''") + "'::jsonb" : "'[]'::jsonb" }}
)
RETURNING *;

)
RETURNING *;

INSERT INTO "business:models" (
  user_id,
  business_type,
  revenue_model,
  primary_channels,
  target_market,
  monthly_revenue_range,
  business_stage,
  team_size,
  confidence_level,
  emotional_signals
)
VALUES (
  '{{ $node["Async Entry1"].json.body.userID }}',
  {{ $json.business_model_type ? "'" + $json.business_model_type.replace(/'/g, "''") + "'" : 'NULL' }},
  {{ $json.revenue_streams && $json.revenue_streams.length > 0 ? "'" + $json.revenue_streams[0].replace(/'/g, "''") + "'" : 'NULL' }},
  {{ $json.revenue_streams ? "ARRAY[" + $json.revenue_streams.map(stream => "'" + stream.replace(/'/g, "''") + "'").join(', ') + "]" : 'NULL' }},
  {{ $json.target_market ? "'" + $json.target_market.replace(/'/g, "''") + "'" : 'NULL' }},
  {{ $json.monthly_revenue ? 
    ($json.monthly_revenue >= 100000 ? "'$100k+'" :
     $json.monthly_revenue >= 50000 ? "'$50k-$100k'" :
     $json.monthly_revenue >= 25000 ? "'$25k-$50k'" :
     $json.monthly_revenue >= 10000 ? "'$10k-$25k'" :
     $json.monthly_revenue >= 5000 ? "'$5k-$10k'" :
     $json.monthly_revenue >= 1000 ? "'$1k-$5k'" : "'<$1k'") : 'NULL' }},
  {{ $json.business_stage ? "'" + $json.business_stage.replace(/'/g, "''") + "'" : 
     ($json.customer_count && $json.customer_count > 1000 ? "'scaling'" :
      $json.customer_count && $json.customer_count > 100 ? "'growth'" :
      $json.monthly_revenue && $json.monthly_revenue > 0 ? "'launch'" : "'idea'") }},
  {{ $json.team_size !== undefined && $json.team_size !== null ? $json.team_size : 'NULL' }},
  {{ $json.confidence_level || 0.5 }},
  {{ $json.emotional_signals ? "'" + $json.emotional_signals.replace(/'/g, "''") + "'" : "'[]'" }}
)
RETURNING *;
